name: MET Nowcast
description:
Immediate weather forecast for specified locations in the Nordic area.

This service delivers two-hour weather forecasts in GeoJSON or XML for locations in Norway, Sweden, Finland and Denmark. Forecasts are updated every 5 minutes. It is our best estimate of the current weather conditions, and is especially useful for predicting immediate precipitation.

When importing this API, please set `https://api.met.no` as URL when prompted.
